# VEHICLE::SET_DISABLE_EXPLODE_FROM_BODY_DAMAGE_ON_COLLISION

## Summary
Prevents a vehicle from exploding when body damage from physical collisions

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** disableExplode
